channel.title: Game crashes with engine error every time when climbing a ladder in an elevator shaft
channel.description: Hello it's me again. My game crashes every time I climb that long ladder in the elevator shaft a bit after i swam in the reactor's coolant. [url='https://i.imgur.com/hJw1Z.jpg']I'm adding a screenshot[/url] to show where exactly my game crashes. I tried going through it quite a few times but the game will always crash and give me [url='https://i.imgur.com/g9Jdt.jpg']an error message[/url] [code]Engine Error Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (38984 > 32768) Tell a programmer to up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE[/code] I'm also adding the minidump file for a couple of those crashes. Hope it helps! hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_26T15_58_4C0.mdmp (98.5 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_26T15_40_14C0.mdmp (102 KB)

item.title: Game crashes with engine error every time when climbing a ladder in an elevator shaft
item.dc:creator: FakeXYZ
item.description:
Hello it’s me again.

My game crashes every time I climb that long ladder in the elevator shaft a bit after i swam in the reactor’s coolant.
I’m adding a screenshot to show where exactly my game crashes. I tried going through it quite a few times but the game will always crash and give me an error message

Engine Error Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (38984 > 32768) Tell a programmer to up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE

I’m also adding the minidump file for a couple of those crashes.
Hope it helps!
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_26T15_58_4C0.mdmp (98.5 KB)
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_26T15_40_14C0.mdmp (102 KB)
